data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Udinese.
Manuel Volpi signals a Udinese throw-in in Benevento's half.
Udinese's Kevin Lasagna breaks free at Stadio Friuli. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Friuli.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 8, Roberto Insigne (Benevento) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Gianluca Caprari puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 9, That's a fine assist from Roberto Insigne.
Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Udine.
Udinese drive upfield and Kevin Lasagna gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In the minute 11, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Manuel Volpi signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Benevento's area.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 13, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tolgay Arslan.
Tolgay Arslan returns to the field for Udinese after picking up a slight injury.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In the minute 15, Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Rodrigo Becao (Udinese) gets a yellow card.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Artur Ionita (Benevento) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In Udine, Roberto Insigne of Benevento is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benevento's half?
Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Throw-in Benevento.
Udinese's Kevin Lasagna gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 28, Manuel Volpi awards Benevento a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Friuli.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Free kick in a good position for Udinese!
Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 33, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tolgay Arslan for Udinese drives towards goal at Stadio Friuli. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Attention is being given to Beneventoâ€™s Pasquale Schiattarella and play has been suspended briefly.
Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento is back on the field again.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 38, Manuel Volpi signals a Udinese throw-in in Benevento's half.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Gianluca Caprari of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 40, Udinese have a goal kick.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benevento push forward at Stadio Friuli and Gianluca Caprari gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Udinese defence.
In the minute 45, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Free kick Udinese.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Udine.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 45, Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Benevento.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Friuli.
Alessandro Tuia is booked for the away team.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Throw-in Benevento.
In the minute 50, Play has been interrupted briefly in Udine to check on Samir, who is grimacing with pain.
Udinese's Samir looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 54, Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Ignacio Pussetto (Udinese) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Manuel Volpi awards Benevento a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In Udine Udinese attack through Jens Stryger Larsen. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Friuli.
Udinese are in shooting range from this free kick.
Udinese's Rodrigo Becao misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
In the minute 60, Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
The away team have replaced Roberto Insigne with Andres Tello. This is the first substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
Bryan Dabo is on a sub for Artur Ionita for Benevento.
Andres Tello (Benevento) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 62, Benevento have a goal kick.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Udinese needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Gerard Deulofeu is replacing Kevin Bonifazi for the home team.
Luca Gotti is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Friuli with Walace replacing Tolgay Arslan.
Udinese's Kevin Lasagna gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Friuli. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 66, Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Benevento are caught offside.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, In Udine, Udinese push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Giuseppe Di Serio is replacing Gianluca Lapadula for Benevento at Stadio Friuli.
Benevento make their fourth substitution with Daam Foulon replacing Riccardo Improta.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 72, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
The match at Stadio Friuli has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gerard Deulofeu, who is down injured.
The home team replace Gerard Deulofeu with Ilija Nestorovski.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Marvin Zeegelaar with Hidde Ter Avest.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gaetano Letizia puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 77, Gianluca Caprari instrumental with a fine assist.
Gianluca Caprari of Benevento smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 80, Rodrigo De Paul for Udinese gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
In the minute 81, Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Marco Sau is on a sub for Gianluca Caprari for Benevento.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Udinese.
Ilija Nestorovski (Udinese) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Benevento defenders.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Friuli.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 87, Manuel Volpi waits before resuming play because Federico Barba for Benevento is still down.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Federico Barba is back on his feet again.
In the minute 89, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
At Stadio Friuli the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Benevento drives forward and Giuseppe Di Serio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Udinese drive upfield and Rodrigo De Paul gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Benevento.
Great shot from Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul but he is denied by the crossbar.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Benevento.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
